Container:
lab-dash ghcr.io/anthonygress/lab-dash:latest https://ghcr.io bridge sh false https://forums.unraid.net/topic/133764-support-grtgbln-docker-templates/ https://github.com/AnthonyGress/lab-dash
This is an open-source user interface designed to be your internally hosted homepage for your homelab/server. Tools: http://[IP]:[PORT:2022]/
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AnthonyGress/lab-dash/refs/heads/main/frontend/public/icon192.png <Support the developer https://buymeacoffee.com/anthonygress Create the folder "lab-dash" under appdate. Within "lab-dash" create two seperate folders: "config" and "uploads".
optional: use privileged: true and network_mode: host for monitoring network usage stats.
/mnt/user/appdata/lab-dash/config /mnt/user/appdata/lab-dash/uploads 99 100 /sys 2022
